1502290.name: My Neighbor Alice
1502290.description:
About this game

My Neighbor Alice is an MMO game with a strong focus on self-expression, collaboration and communities. Players can explore, gather resources, craft unique NFTs, and shape their own virtual world in the Lummelunda Archipelago.

Key Features

  • It resonates with a broad target audience of all ages and genders. It emphasizes collaboration over competition, providing a relaxed virtual world where collective efforts yield better results. 

  • It adopts a narrative-driven approach. It is not a set of isolated experiences. The virtual world is an Archipelago with different islands and regions, each having different vibes, styles, resources, and characters with stories and quests to complete. 

  • It encourages exploration, with players gathering resources across the Archipelago to craft items to customize their virtual spaces and design avatar clothing.

  • It fosters self-expression and creativity. The game plans to provide User-Generated Content (UGC) tools, allowing players to create assets and experiences.
1502290.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
